subject: Volvo Ocean Race
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: The United States yacht Pirates of the Caribbean won the ninth and final leg of the Volvo Ocean Race yesterday in Goteborg, Sweden. The Dutch entry ABN Amro One took overall honors for the around-the-world regatta. The Dutch yacht, skippered by Mike Sanderson, was last in the six-yacht fleet in the ninth leg but won the 36,000-mile race with a total of 96 points.
